snippet: Canal-vaulters dig the point of their giant poles into the muddy bed of the canal near the bank. They then leap onto the pole and try to throw themselves to the other side. Many land in the canal.
abstract: Linschoten Journal; Canal-vaulting with giant poles has been gaining popularity in recent years; it is one of several little-known Dutch sports that are enjoying a revival; canal-vaulters do not seek to go high, like pole-vaulters, but long.
lead_paragraph: Canal-vaulters dig the point of their giant poles into the muddy bed of the canal near the bank. They then leap onto the pole and try to throw themselves to the other side. Many land in the canal.

headline.seo: Little-Known Dutch Sports Experience a Revival
headline.main: Dutch Sports Revival Puts Canal-Vaulting Back in the Spotlight
headline.print_headline: Dutch Sports Revival Puts Canal-Vaulting Back in the Spotlight
